item.title: Travel - Google
item.description: Plan your trip with Google. Find flights, hotels, vacation rentals, things to do, and more.

item.title: Find Cheap Flights Worldwide & Book Your Ticket - Google
item.description: Select your departure and destination cities in the form on the top of the page, and use the calendar to pick travel dates and find the cheapest flights available.

item.title: Explore - Google
item.description: Explore and compare cheap flights to anywhere with Google Flights. Find your next flight, track price changes to get the best deals, and book your ticket.

item.title: Ajuda do Travel - Google Help
item.description: Central de Ajuda oficial do Travel, onde você pode encontrar dicas e tutoriais sobre como usar o produto e outras respostas a perguntas frequentes.

item.title: Travel Help - Google Help
item.description: Official Travel Help Center where you can find tips and tutorials on using Travel and other answers to frequently asked questions.

item.title: Explore
item.description: 1-week trip in the next 6 months All filters Stops Travel mode Interests Price Airlines

item.title: Google Maps
item.description: Find local businesses, view maps and get driving directions in Google Maps.

item.title: Tripadvisor: Plan & Book Trips - Apps on Google Play
item.description: - Tap into the world’s largest travel community for tips and advice wherever, whenever - Save time with AI summaries, which gives you a quick overview of what travelers are saying

item.title: Track and Compare Flight Prices - Google Flights
item.description: Track your favorite flights with Google Flights Price Tracking. Monitor fares, get flight alerts, and compare other flight options.

item.title: Google Docs
item.description: Create and edit web-based documents, spreadsheets, and presentations. Store documents online and access them from any computer.
